plot: Today, the face of homelessness in America is this: A black man, around 40 years old, living in a large, urban city. Invisible Men are artful, experimental snapshots into the lives of two formerly homeless men in New York City.
title: Invisible Men: Greg's Story
plot_es: Today, the face of homelessness in America is this: A black man, around 40 years old, living in a large, urban city. Invisible Men are artful, experimental snapshots into the lives of two formerly homeless men in New York City.
